context.expression: (user.role === 'hts_provider' || user.role === 'clinician') && contact.patient_birthDate && summary.contactAgeInMonths >= 18 && !contact.muted && contact.contact_type === 'universal_client' && (summary.hts_retest_latest.final_result == '_703_positive_99DCT' || summary.screenedToday && summary.lastHtsService === 'linkage') && !summary.has_hts_linkage
